title: [A Frozen Glen]
description: The breeze softly blowing through here carries a mournful wail, its sound as bleak as the white wasteland surrounding you.  High above, the sun is clearly losing its battle to free itself from the bonds of the darkened clouds embracing it.

The breeze softly blowing through here carries a mournful wail, its sound as bleak as the white wasteland surrounding you.  High above, the moon is clearly losing its battle to free itself from the bonds of the darkened clouds embracing it.
